name: Gloomtower
description:
Gloomtower is a small action packed platformer game inspired by the old school game Magic Sword. Fight your way through 15 stages of the Gloomtower to stop an evil necromancer.

CONTROLS

A = ATTACK (2X SECOND ATTACK)

S = JUMP

SPACE = PAUSE ON / OFF

WHILE PAUSE

Y = YES

N = NO

TITLE SCREEN

Enter = START GAME

Esc = Leave game on title screen

SPECIAL BUTTONS

F = Toggle Fullscreen

M = Turn off/on music

R = Restart game on STAGE 1

P = Swap color palette
